reviewText: Well i am a huge MMA fan and i like watching both stand up and ground wars. And this DVD just didn't entertain me at all. I found it very hard to watch it, as there were no big name fighters on the card. You saw a former UFC champion in Maurice Smith, and you could tell father time caught up with him as he looked fat and out of shape. And Bob Sapp looked terrible in the main event as he got DESTROYED!
